explanation: [0-0] A woman in a white uniform, wearing a transparent mask and a white hat, is standing in front of a giant round rotating griddle. On a yellow table to the right, there is a red bucket containing yellow batter. The wall behind her is yellow. The flags of South Korea and France are displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-10] The woman scoops up golden batter from a red bucket beside her with a long-handled ladle in her right hand and pours it onto the center of the griddle. She holds a wooden board in her left hand, ready to spread it out. She uses the board to evenly spread the batter on the rotating griddle, forming a growing circle. On the right side are the spread pancakes.
